security.title: Security Settings
security.description: Manage your authentication methods and security preferences

biometric.title: Biometric Authentication
biometric.setupDescription: Use your fingerprint, face ID, or security key to sign in

activity.title: Recent Security Activity
activity.description: Track recent security events on your account

monitoring.title: Breach Monitoring
monitoring.description: Monitor if your credentials have been compromised
monitoring.checkDescription: We continuously monitor known data breaches to check if your account credentials have been exposed. All checks use k-anonymity to protect your privacy.
monitoring.credentialsSafe: Your credentials have not been found in any known data breaches.

recommendations.title: Security Recommendations
recommendations.uniquePassword: Use a unique password for this account
recommendations.registerPasskey: Register a passkey for biometric authentication

killSwitch.title: Kill Switch
killSwitch.description: Blocks all internet traffic if VPN connection drops
killSwitch.allTrafficBlocked: All traffic will be blocked if VPN disconnects
killSwitch.normalOperation: Normal internet access if VPN disconnects

dnsLeak.title: DNS Leak Protection
dnsLeak.description: Prevents DNS queries from bypassing the VPN tunnel
dnsLeak.allQueriesProtected: All DNS queries are routed through VPN

ipv6Leak.title: IPv6 Leak Protection
ipv6Leak.description: Prevents IPv6 traffic from bypassing the VPN
ipv6Leak.ipv6Blocked: IPv6 traffic is blocked or routed through VPN

webRTC.title: WebRTC Leak Protection
webRTC.description: Prevents WebRTC from exposing your real IP

splitTunneling.title: Split Tunneling
splitTunneling.description: Control which applications use the VPN connection
splitTunneling.includeModeDescription: Only selected apps will use the VPN. All other traffic goes through your regular internet connection.
splitTunneling.excludeModeDescription: Selected apps bypass the VPN. All other traffic uses the VPN connection.

realTimeStatus.title: Real-time Bandwidth Usage
realTimeStatus.clickToConnect: Click the button below to establish a VPN connection
